DataTap Solutions
Empower your teams with applications, networks and beyond!
Traditional Application Performance Management (APM) tools fall short of addressing complex performance issues in a hybrid infrastructure environment. APM tools focus heavily on the application internals and fail to give the underlying network factor measurement. This leads to numerous time cycles spent on problem solving by network and application owners. Lack of integrated tools also make the troubleshooting a manual root cause analysis (RCA) process across several servers and application logs. A single overarching problem theme seems to be analytics tools that operate in silos, requiring coordination and manual intervention.
Challenges
> Diversified data sources - How information from application, network, and end user devices can be coalesced
> Too much data, very little insight - The interest being in summarized problem statement, not charts and graphs that need to be interpreted
Impact
> Lengthy and expensive mean-time-to-repair (MTTR) - Operations needing a lot of time spent in merging the intelligence requiring diversified skills
> Data deluge - Augmenting IT support staff to handle new functional systems being both expensive and non- scalable model
DataTap's Solution
Our solution leverages Deep Learning, Artificial Intelligence and IoT (Internet of Things) to process your data originating from multiple data sources and extracts enriched insights avoiding data deluge. Our IT operations visibility solution spans across multiple problem and skill domains, making it both cost effective and scalable. DataTap addresses typical APM problems along with complex Infrastructure Performance Management (IPM) as well as Digital Performance Management (DPM). We can help you with orchestrating workflows across your cloud, mobile, and IoT deployments from a single consolidated solution.
  Visualize
  Secure
  Optimize
  Troubleshoot
Fortify your operations strategy with state-of-the-art Operations Analytics product from DataTap Solutions to get a single pane of visibility to your application, environment and data.
Please reach out to us and we can assist you with a free consultation to address your specific problem.
